attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KDvNmvtoZOUr4jDETYT_content
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a [[1d4]] and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KDvPS21XlavhspZgZIn_content
attribs.current:
You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: proficiencies
attribs.current: Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields, Simple Weapons, Speak With Small Beasts, musical instrument lyre

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KDyxc7cDbxWJlRlRUGk_content
attribs.current:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KDyyQfXvDnatIkOlP8t_content
attribs.current:
You either create or destroy water. Create Water: You create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in an open container. Alternatively, the water falls as rain in a 30ft cube within range, extinguishing exposed flames in the area.
Destroy water. you destroy up to 10gallons of water in an open container within range. alternatively, you destroy fog in a 30ft cube.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KDyz8-53mgthOplhTe7_content
attribs.current: This Spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm.  Choose a beast that you can see within range.  It must see and hear you.  If the beast's int is 4 or higher, the spell fails. otherwise the beast must succeed on a wisdom save or be charmed.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KDz5jTYI8wrMrZ1riRn_content
attribs.current:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the Duration. The Illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again.

If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the Duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

If you create an image of an object - such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest - it must be no larger than a 5-foot cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an Illusion, because things can pass through it.

If a creature uses its action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an Illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the Illusion for what it is, the Illusion becomes faint to the creature.

attribs.name: damage_resistances
attribs.current: Advantage on all Int/Wis/Cha magic saves

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I place no stock in wealthy or well mannered folk.  money and manners wont save you from a hungry owlbear.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I am slow to trust members of other races, tribes, societies.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Nature: the natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I will bring terrible wrath down on the evildoers of destroyed my homeland.

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KDvlFsMmhUNDoDnHjom_content
attribs.current: Wheat Sheaf wrapped in a green ribbon-Arawai

attribs.name: miscellaneous_notes
attribs.current:
--------Info Bits-----
Gold Given to Arawai- 63g 9s 6c
Real Name-WillowbarkPopip Redseededtree
Nature Domain
Worships Arawai
Fiances Name-foewlina wilder
Moss Green ShyTree-Fiances Village Name
Imaginary SkiTrol Grove of NobleTrees-Willabars Village Name
Gave Tomas(in the mists) -7 small twigs from my casting components supplies.

---------PTSD------------
Elinara shot a human in the head directly in front of his eyes....as he tried to save the mans life.  Side Effect: A Human being injured might trigger a flashback of the man being shot in the head (crossbow bolt). 11%chance , (increases 2% per human killed in front of him)(+1% for thinking Alistair was crushed by a rock).
Errata/sidenote for undead that look human:Check only when Willabar attacks them.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KEhUNbauTg7vebVXNjV_freetext
attribs.current: You gain the ability to channel divine energy directly from your deity, using that energy to fuel magical effects. You start with two such effects: Turn Undead and an effect determined by your domain. Some domains grant you additional effects as you advance in levels, as noted in the domain description

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KEhUNbauTg7vebVXNjW_freetext
attribs.current:
As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring the undead. Each undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.
A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KFAwZ0L1ldoiLscvd3L_freetext
attribs.current: You gain the ability to channel divine energy directly from your deity, using that energy to fuel magical effects. You start with two such effects: Turn Undead and an effect determined by your domain. Some domains grant you additional effects as you advance in levels, as noted in the domain description

A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. attribs.current:

A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KFBT9dnvsYqnsKYKeZd_content
attribs.current: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the Duration. The knowledge and awareness of many beasts is limited by their Intelligence, but at minimum, beasts can give you information about nearby locations and Monsters, including whatever they can perceive or have perceived within the past day. You might be able to persuade a beast to perform a small favor for you, at the DM's discretion.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KGc4PFB28HsJNZK4eHp_content
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance, and the target's AC can't be less than 16, regardless of what kind of armor it is wearing.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KGc4ZJaTLGRql8CJBUn_materials
attribs.current: Seven sharp thorns or seven small twigs, each sharpened	 to a point

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KGc4ZJaTLGRql8CJBUn_content
attribs.current:
The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range twists and sprouts hard spikes and thorns. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 2d4 piercing damage for every 5 feet it travels.

The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can't see the area at the time the spell is cast must make a Wisdom (Perception) check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KGd77sAyrNnchQjjh18_content
attribs.current:
One of 4 effects:
1.You create a tiny harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24hours.  The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on.
2. You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, a puff of wind, the sound of a small animal, or the faint odor of skunk.  The effect must fit in a 5 ft cube.
3. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf open.
4. You Instantly light or snuff out a candle, a torch or small campfire.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KGdAcQJFHXYXytKlzQj_content
attribs.current:
You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an Attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the Attack roll or saving throw.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KGd8iGk6JKPvVYuRLjk_content
attribs.current: For the Duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located. Similarly, you know if there is a place of object within 30 feet of you that has been magically consecrated or desecrated. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KGxTrSDqA41TTDHKxi3_content
attribs.current: From my fiances wedding area. [[100]] Years prior to meeting her.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KGy1XDLUGmNnka9xCDZ_display_text
attribs.current:
Starting at 2nd level you can use your channel divinity to charm animals and plants.
As an action, you present your holy symbol and invoke the name of your deity.  Each beast or plant creature that can see you within 30 feet of you must make a wis saving throw.  If the creature fails its saving throws, it is charmed by you for 1 min or until it takes damage.  While it is charmed by you, it is friendly to you and other creatures you designate.

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KE5a2Z-CWbbsjhxVcyn_content
attribs.current: A human sized mace, used as a staff.  Intricate self made carvings in the hilt.

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KE5Ud0JPAhxNbEbJza2_content
attribs.current: For capturing small animals, gnomely((humanly))-(In cart)

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHSXjZQGXhsEDk5mXUJ_content
attribs.current: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, or Poisoned.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHSY87H8WFNIoctiMrW_target
attribs.current: Each humanoid in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHSY87H8WFNIoctiMrW_content
attribs.current:
You attempt to suppress strong emotions in a group of people. Each humanoid in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range must make a Charisma saving throw a creature can choose to fail this saving throw if it wishes. If a creature fails its saving throw, choose one of the following two effects.

You can suppress any effect causing a target to be charmed or frightened. When this spell ends, any suppressed effect resumes, provided that its duration has not expired in the meantime.

Alternatively, you can make a target indifferent about creatures of your choice that it is hostile toward. This indifference ends if the target is attacked or harmed by a spell or if it witnesses any of its friends being harmed. When the spell ends, the creature becomes hostile again, unless the DM rules otherwise.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHSYrNDuAz67NcAp60Y_content
attribs.current:
Note:  Can be cast ONLY once per day.  
You touch a living creature that has 0 hp. The creature becomes stable.  This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KHgsZmnn-j-nlP44PMt_content
attribs.current: SEEDS: drakus flower; soarwood; CALABAR BEAN;SCILLIA BEANS; SPINEFLOWER;  MIRROR BASIL; ginger root; Basil; Sage; MONEYWART

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KDvfBst-N1QLpnMRDbM_content
attribs.current:
This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn clack, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage.

This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can't restore magic to such an object.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KIRbe0mWF1rmjt6QPNe_content
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature.  Once before the spell ends. the target can roll a [[d4]] and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice.  It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw.  The spell then ends.

attribs.name: spells_level_1_macro_var
attribs.current: [Healing Word](~repeating_spell_-kdyxc7cdbxwjlrlrugk_spell), [Create or destroy water](~repeating_spell_-kdyyqfxvdnatikolp8t_spell), [Animal Friendship](~repeating_spell_-kdyz8-53mgthoplhte7_spell), [Speak with animals](~repeating_spell_-kfbt9dnvsyqnskykezd_spell), [Detect Evil and Good](~repeating_spell_-kgd8igk6jkpvvyurljk_spell), [Bless](~repeating_spell_-kgdacqjfhxyxytklzqj_spell)
